long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a car dealer looking to stay one step ahead?

With the VinAssessment Chrome Extension, you'll have access to a vehicle's complete history before you buy or sell. As you browse automotive websites, the extension automatically detects VIN numbers, giving you instant access to vital details like pricing, sales history, odometer readings, damage photos, accident reports, and airbag deployment status—all with just one click.

Now you can view vehicle information directly on the websites you already use, simplifying your workflow and providing quick access to comprehensive car reports. Track real-time price trends, compare offers, and estimate market value and repair costs—all in one convenient extension. Whether it's auctions or title brands, nothing stays hidden.

How does it work?
As soon as our extension recognises a VIN number, you'll instantly receive a prompt offering a full vehicle history report - right at your fingertips.

Key features:
- Instant access: Say goodbye to copy-pasting and switching tabs. You'll have all the information you need with just one click.
- No manual entry: The 17-character VIN can be tricky to type - avoid mistakes by letting our extension do it for you.
- Automatic VIN detection: No more searching for VINs hidden in text. Our tool will find and highlight it for you, wherever it is on the page.

What's in the Report?
With VinAssessment, you get an all-in-one vehicle report that includes:
- Accurate Pricing: Know the current market value of the vehicle.
- Sales History: View past sales transactions.
- Odometer Readings: Track mileage changes over time.
- Damage Photos & Reports: See any accident history, along with detailed damage photos and compare it in Photo Duel.
- Airbag Deployment Status: Check if the vehicle's airbags have ever been deployed.

Be the leader among car dealers with full vehicle history insights. Download the VinAssessment Chrome extension today and know your next car inside and out!
